 Financial Aid and Awards Office 
1455 De Maisonneuve Blvd. W. 
           Room GM-230 
           Montreal, Quebec, H3G 1M8 
 Location 
 We'll be pleased to serve you at our downtown office any day of the week, or at Loyola on Tuesdays! 
 Financial Aid and Awards Office 
 Sir George Williams Campus 
 GM 230.00 (see map) 
1550 de Maisonneuve Blvd W. 
 Financial Aid and Awards Office 
 Loyola Campus 
 AD 121.02 (see map) 
 Service hours 
 Sir George Williams Campus 
 Our offices are open from Monday to Friday, 10 a.m. to 5 p.m. 
 Our walk-in clinic hours to meet with a financial aid advisor are every afternoon from 1 p.m. to 4 p.m.   
 Loyola Campus 
 Our office is open every Tuesday from 9 a.m. to 12 p.m. and 1 p.m. to 4:30 p.m. 
 Please note that the last date to visit the Loyola office for the Fall 2017 semester will be Tuesday, November 28, 2017. The office will reopen for the Winter 2018 semester on Tuesday, January 9, 2018. 
 Appointments 
 Make one at any time by emailing  fundingyoureducation@concordia.ca
